[FeaturedSnippetDirectAnswer](./anguyen-search-core-testtt.featuredsnippetdirectanswer.md)


</td><td>

All possible built-in [BaseFeaturedSnippetDirectAnswer](./anguyen-search-core-testtt.basefeaturedsnippetdirectanswer.md) interfaces.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[FieldValueDirectAnswer](./anguyen-search-core-testtt.fieldvaluedirectanswer.md)


</td><td>

Possible built-in and custom [BaseFieldValueDirectAnswer](./anguyen-search-core-testtt.basefieldvaluedirectanswer.md) interfaces.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[HighlightedFields](./anguyen-search-core-testtt.highlightedfields.md)


</td><td>

A mapping of fields to the values emphasized by the Search API.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[SearchConfig](./anguyen-search-core-testtt.searchconfig.md)


</td><td>

The main configuration options for [SearchCore](./anguyen-search-core-testtt.searchcore.md)<!-- -->. For a full description of the options, see [BaseSearchConfig](./anguyen-search-core-testtt.basesearchconfig.md)<!-- -->. The config requires either an apiKey or a token.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[StaticFilter](./anguyen-search-core-testtt.staticfilter.md)


</td><td>

Represents a static filter that will be used to refine results.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
